alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Lawrence; Mercer (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 10:09AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT GUERNSEY...NORTHWESTERN MONROE... SOUTHEASTERN COSHOCTON...CARROLL...TUSCARAWAS...NOBLE...HARRISON... NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...COLUMBIANA...EASTERN MUSKINGUM...WESTERN BELMONT...NORTHWESTERN BEAVER...MERCER...WESTERN LAWRENCE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 1008 AM EST, radar indicated gusty showers were located along a cold front extending from 7 miles east of Orwell to South Webster. Movement was east at 50 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. These gusts will last for less than an hour, and will be follwed by gusts of 25 to 35 MPH into the afternoon. Locations impacted include... New Castle, New Philadelphia, Hermitage, Sharon, Dover, Salem, Cambridge, Columbiana, Uhrichsville, East Palestine, Sharpsville, and Barnesville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 158 and 210. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 86, and near mile marker 93. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 122 and 138. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 18. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Use extra caution if traveling, especially in high-profile vehicles.
